Author: mij3i
Text: I was forced into treatment when I was still a minor, and my parents say that if I don't continue to attend therapy, I cant go to college. . . like my therapist is great and I feel so, so terrible for wasting his time. . . If I had the option I wouldnt be in therapy rn.

Author: romeodendron
Text: I understand what you’re trying to do, but why are you in therapy with this man if you aren’t interested in getting better? If you hide this stuff from him, this helps no one and wastes everyone’s time. I understand that the idea of going inpatient is frightening, but if that’s what it takes to get into recovery, I wish you the best. ): <3
